roleset.name: be posterior to
roleset.note: CAUDAL-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Slight comparison to neighbor.01. Neighbor.01 is a memebr of Vn class contiguous_location-47.8. Framed by Katie. (from caudal.01-j)

example.name: both args
example.text: The proximal neck of the aneurysm is 3 cm caudal to the right renal artery.
